ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadpool and Old Man Logan are back at it for one more try at saving a new Omega-level mutant named Maddie.
But Maddie wants to take on evil weapon-manufacturer GenForm all on her own.
She may not need any man...
...but Wade and Logan have never been big on listening!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|---------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Declan Shalvey & Lee Loughridge | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Ron Lim & Rachelle Rosenberg | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Part Five
